# Corazon (drag queen)

Corazon (also known as Corazon Filipinas) is the stage name of Lenard Medrano, a Filipino drag performer, make-up artist, and designer who competed on season 1 of Drag Race Philippines. She appeared at RuPaul's DragCon UK in 2023.
Personal life
Corazon is from Bolinao, Pangasinan.
Filmography
Television
* Drag Race Philippines (season 1)
* Bring Back My Girls (2023)
